data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 1,515 believers in Trat, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Trat, Thailand
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Trat to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.section_summary: On average, 29 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Trat, Thailand.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Trat. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Trat.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Chong people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, help your children in Trat, Thailand find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Trat that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 234,300 citizens of Trat, Thailand, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.
